Shopping Cart

{{listCart.length}} items
{{item.memory}}GB -- {{item.color}}
{{item.name}}
{{item.price*item.quantity | currency}}
Back to shop

Summary

items {{listCart.length}}
Total price:
{{totail| currency}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from './../../service/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.scss'] }) export class CartComponent { listCart: any[] = [] totail: number = 0 constructor(private DataService: DataService) { } ngOnInit() { this.load_Cart() } load_Cart() { this.DataService.get("/cart").then((req: any) => { this.listCart = req; this.totail=this.listCart.reducer((a,b)=> a.price*a.quantity+ b.price*b.quantity) }) } change_cart(id:any,quantity:number) { this.listCart.forEach((item: any) => { if(item.id == id){ this.DataService.patch(`/cart/${id}`,{quantity:quantity}) this. ngOnInit() } }) } }
